item.title: Webassembly
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What WebAssembly (abbreviated Wasm) was launched in 2017 as a low-level assembly-like language with a compact binary format, so it’s fast to load, execute, and run with near-native performance.
